price: Ԑberε a Y’abͻfoͻ no baa Lut hͻ no, ne werε ho maa wͻn (abͻfoͻ no, εnam kuro no mu foͻ adwen bͻne nti), na onni tumi sε (ͻbetumi abͻ wͻn ho ban). Deε ͻkaeε ne sε: “Saa da yi yε da bͻne “.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُوطٗا سِيٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡعٗا وَقَالَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَصِيبٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walammā jāat rusulunā lūṭan sīa bihim waḍāqa bihim dharʿan waqāla hādhā yawmun ʿaṣībun
